#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int LL;
#define f first
#define sc second
#define M 1000000007
int gcd(int a, int b) { return (b == 0 ? a : gcd(b, a % b)); }
int lcm(int a, int b) { return (a * (b / gcd(a, b))); }
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int p,q;
        scanf("%d %d",&p,&q);
        int g=gcd(p,q);
        p/=g;
        q/=g;
        while(q%2==0){
            q/=2;
        }
        int k=(q+1);
        if((k&(k-1))!=0)
        {
           // printf("Hello\n");
            printf("NO\n");
            continue;
        }
        else
        {
            if((q+1)%p==0)
            {
                printf("YES\n");
                continue;
            }
            else
            {
                printf("NO\n");
                continue;
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
